2026-02-12.author: ArchiveExplorer
2026-02-12.text_en:
Some guy deposited $150 on polymarket

just checked his wallet

now sitting at $104k profit

asked what's his strategy

it's simple 
his bot buys everything under 5 cents

no analysis 
no predictions

some of his winning trades:
S&P 500 direction: $4.55 ‚Üí $2,531 
Syria strikes Israel: $16.78 ‚Üí $2,324

trades obscure markets 
where prices can be random

these markets have low liquidity nobody wants to research them for small profit

he started with only $150 
what's stopping you?

2026-02-12.author: 0xMovez
2026-02-12.text_en:
Polymarket traders Python strategy decoder script

Copy-trading a wallet without understanding its strategy is "gambling"

This Python script can decode any Polymarket wallet‚Äôs strategy in 30 seconds.

You can send the results to your Clawdbot and ask it to copy the strategy !

How to run script in 30-sec: 
 
> Download Python3.1 on your Mac/PC
> Install dependencies using: "pip3 install requests"
> Upload { analyze_user.py, analyze_trades.py }
> Run "python3 analyze_user.py {market} {wallet}"

As a result, you‚Äôll get raw data showing whether a trader is just gambling or has a consistent strategy.

Use Jayden‚Äôs article to find all the files and an explanation of how to use them.

2026-02-12.author: SolSt1ne
2026-02-12.text_en:
I built a powerful real-time edge terminal specifically for @Polymarket - multi-timeframe dashboard covering all coins! (100% FREE & fully open-source)

In one sentence: This Python bot gives you live alpha on Polymarket‚Äôs Up/Down crypto binaries by fusing real-time Binance order flow, current Polymarket probabilities, and multi-TF technical analysis.

Spot mispricings fast - where the market odds haven‚Äôt yet caught up to momentum, aggressive delta, or strong signals. 
Perfect for lightning-fast 15-minute scalps (markets resolve every 15 min with constant repricing) or cleaner swings on 1h / 4h / daily horizons.
Pure decision-support tool - no auto-trading, just sharp, actionable insight delivered straight to your terminal.

> Coins covered: BTC, ETH, SOL, XRP 
> Timeframes: 15m, 1h, 4h, daily - All 16 market combinations are live and heavily traded on Polymarket (especially the 15m contracts - ultra-fast flips)

Features at a glance: 

> Streams live trades + full order book from Binance > Pulls real-time Up/Down prices & depth via Polymarket WebSocket 
> Computes 11+ indicators on the fly 
> Rolls everything up into a clear BULLISH / BEARISH / NEUTRAL bias score + probability estimate per timeframe 
> Displays a clean, colorful, auto-refreshing terminal dashboard

Order-book signals: 

> OBI (imbalance)
> visible buy/sell walls
> liquidity depth (0.1% / 0.5% / 1.0%)
> net flow & volume
> CVD (across 1m/3m/5m windows)
> 1m delta
> Volume Profile + POC

Technical indicators: 
> RSI (14)
> MACD (12/26/9) + signal line + histogram
> VWAP
> EMA 5 / EMA 20 cross
>Heikin-Ashi candle streak count

Important: 
this is NOT an auto-trading bot. It highlights where Polymarket odds are lagging real Binance order-flow and multi-timeframe TA - giving you an edge on 15m scalping, 1‚Äì4h momentum trades, and daily directional confirmation.

Built with: 
Python (asyncio + Rich/Textual for a slick CLI look) One-line start: 
python https://t.co/ATX2BzEFRH Refreshes every few seconds Completely free & open-source ‚Üí GitHub repo

Want access? Like + RT + drop a reply or quote below - I‚Äôll DM you the GitHub link

Don‚Äôt miss the edge - especially on those 15-minute markets that flip every quarter hour. Seeing all timeframes at once is real alpha.

Here‚Äôs to green candles and fat PnL!

If you can type, anyone can copy my Polymarket high-frequency bot.

I didn‚Äôt write a single line of code. I built a top-tier strategy just by ‚Äúchatting‚Äù with AI,one that self-debugs, self-repairs, and even uses ‚Äúlarge model decision-making + small model monitoring‚Äù.

This is a life-changing, dimension-dropping opportunity for ordinary people:
Let AI write the script (working > perfect)
Let AI review losses (the key to evolution)
Let AI fix bugs on its own (24/7 passive income)

2026-02-12.author: krajekis
2026-02-12.text_en:
The Hidden Power of Time in @Polymarket BTC 15m Trading [Full Guide]

On Polymarket, you must decide:  
Will BTC close UP or DOWN in the next 15 minutes?

Most traders don‚Äôt lose because of strategy.  
They lose because they ignore time.  
Time determines edge.

Key: TIME ‚Äì BTC Trading Sessions (EST)

‚Ä¢ WEEKDAYS:

1) Asian Session (7:00 PM ‚Äì 3:00 AM EST)

Market State: 
Compression / Range / Low volatility  
This is mean-reversion time.

Blueprint:
Use VWAP + RSI(14) + low ATR + volume + MACD divergence  
- Price stretched above flat VWAP + RSI overbought + weak volume ‚Üí Choose DOWN  
- Price stretched below VWAP + RSI oversold + weak selling ‚Üí Choose UP  
- Low ATR confirms compression  
- Ignore MACD crossovers  
- Only trade MACD divergence: Higher high in price + lower high in MACD ‚Üí DOWN  
  Lower low in price + higher low in MACD ‚Üí UP  
- Avoid breakouts. Avoid mid-range trades.  

Edge: Fade extremes.

2) London Kill Zone (2:00 AM ‚Äì 5:00 AM EST) 

Market State: 
Expansion / Liquidity sweep  
Asian high or low often gets attacked first.

Blueprint:
Use Volume spike + EMA21 + VWAP reclaim + rising ATR + MACD acceleration  
- Sweep high + strong red 15m close below VWAP & EMA21 + expanding bearish MACD histogram ‚Üí Choose DOWN  
- Sweep low + strong green close above VWAP & EMA21 + expanding bullish MACD histogram ‚Üí Choose UP  
- Volume must expand  
- ATR must increase  
- MACD histogram expansion > simple crossover  
- Never enter during sweep candle. Enter after confirmation close.

Edge: Trade after liquidity grab.

3) NY Open / Overlap (7:00 AM ‚Äì 11:00 AM EST)  

Market State:
 Maximum volatility / Momentum phase  
Large moves happen here.

Blueprint:
Use VWAP slope + EMA21/EMA50 alignment + high volume + high ATR + MACD momentum  
- Strong 15m close breaking structure + volume expansion ‚Üí Follow direction  
- Break above level + MACD above zero expanding ‚Üí UP  
- Break below level + MACD below zero expanding ‚Üí DOWN  
- Price above rising VWAP + EMA21 > EMA50 ‚Üí bullish bias  
- Price below falling VWAP ‚Üí bearish bias  
- ATR must confirm expansion  
- If MACD histogram contracts after strong move ‚Üí potential short-term reversal  
- Wait for candle close. Never click mid-spike.

Edge: Confirmation + aligned momentum.

4) London Close (10:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM EST)

Market State: 
Exhaustion / Slowdown  
Momentum fades. Wicks increase.

Blueprint:
Use RSI divergence + VWAP stretch + ATR contraction + MACD histogram slowdown  
- Extended move far from VWAP + rejection candle ‚Üí Fade move  
- Price makes marginal new high but MACD histogram shrinks ‚Üí Choose DOWN  
- Price makes marginal new low but histogram shrinks ‚Üí Choose UP  
- Decreasing ATR confirms volatility contraction  
- Reduce size in choppy conditions.

Edge: Fade overextended trends.

‚Ä¢ WEEKENDS:

Market State: 
Thin liquidity / Lower institutional participation  
More fake breakouts. Less follow-through.

Blueprint:
Use VWAP mean reversion + strict volume filter + ATR + cautious MACD divergence  
- Breakout without volume expansion ‚Üí Ignore  
- Price stretched far from VWAP inside range ‚Üí Fade  
  Upper stretch + weak momentum ‚Üí DOWN  
  Lower stretch + weak momentum ‚Üí UP  
- Smaller ATR = smaller expected move  
- Ignore MACD crossovers; only use divergence as confirmation  
- Trade smaller size.

Edge: Patience + reduced risk.

Indicator Hierarchy:
1. Time (session behavior)  
2. Volume  
3. VWAP  
4. ATR  
5. EMA structure  
6. MACD  
7. RSI  

Final Rule: 
- Asian ‚Üí Fade extremes  
- London ‚Üí Trade post-sweep momentum  
- NY ‚Üí Trade confirmed acceleration  
- Close ‚Üí Fade exhaustion  
- Weekend ‚Üí Trade small and selective   

15m Execution Checklist Before Clicking UP or DOWN:

- Which session is active?
- Compression or expansion?
- Range extreme or breakout level?
- Volume confirming move?
- ATR expanding or contracting?
- MACD accelerating or slowing?
- Did the 15m candle close strong?

If unclear ‚Üí no trade.

Time defines probability.  
Indicators confirm it.  
Then you click UP or DOWN.

2026-02-12.author: JeongHaeju
2026-02-12.text_en:
A Polymarket user just turned $1,000 ‚Üí $150K risk-free.

157x.

Here‚Äôs how:
A whale was bonding the "SOLV Energy IPO Closing Market Cap" market.

The trading day closed and most public platforms were showing a ~$6B valuation. That made the ‚ÄúOver $5.4B‚Äù market look like a free bond at YES. The whale bought 286,000 shares at 98c.

Here's the crazy part: the publicly visible price wasn‚Äôt accurate.

The only accurate closing market cap was available on Bloomberg Terminal, showing a market cap of $3.4B

A user with Bloomberg Terminal access bought 157,000 NO shares at .6c.

The NO is now trading at 97¬¢ and will resolve as the correct bet.

He‚Äôs currently up $150K.

The whale is down $270K.

One of the craziest risk-free flips I‚Äôve seen on the platform.

2026-02-12.author: RetroValix
2026-02-12.text_en:
This guy made $600,000 on Polymarket using software, buying markets for $28

His trading bot makes 14 trades per hour or 0.22 trades per minute. He trades only sports markets and in 3 months turned $5,321 into $597,928

His strategy is simple:

> The median size of his trades is $28
> He uses Split and Merge
> He buys when the probability on Polymarket has not yet had time to reflect the events in the match

Here is the link to this guy‚Äôs account:
https://t.co/BCyzLH7l56

You can copy trade smart money through the mobile app:
https://t.co/jMUgXhfXIf

This app was developed by @ratio_dot_you

2026-02-12.author: DextersSolab
2026-02-12.text_en:
What's the point of working 9-5 if you can make $500k by counting Elon Musk's tweets?

That's probably the question this trader asked himself 3 monhts ago.

Since then he made 1,400 trades on Polymarket.
With 82% Win Rate.

But how?

Here's his strategy exposed:

If you check his trading history, you'll see that most of his successful trades were closed before the resolution.

This trader is sniping the most unlikely outcomes at 1-5% and sells them later at 5-10% making a 2x-3x return.

Why does this work?

At the beginning, most low-probability outcomes are priced low.

Because at the start Elon has zero posts.

The beginning is always the same.

But as soon as he starts posting frequently, the most unlikely outcomes spike.

Because the number of tweets gets closer and closer to those outcomes.

So this trader sells everything by limit orders and wins without waiting for the resolution.

That's it.

He just found a way to sell overpriced shares to traders who hold till the resolution.

His profile link: [https://t.co/wo7rRmPKEy]

Leaving a full copy trading guide quoted below.
